selected_metadata.overview: 古い寺の解体現場で見つかった、二つの顔と四つの腕を持つ奇形のミイラ。それを目撃した者には、物理的な「部位の欠損」や「発狂」が連鎖する。Jホラー特有の『呪いの感染』を描く。
selected_metadata.horror_point: 人気アニメ等の影響で名前の認知度が高い一方、元ネタのクリーチャーとしての禍々しさを強調。開けてはいけない箱（Forbidden Box）というプロットは、視聴者の好奇心と恐怖を同時に刺激する。

data.description: What happens when you find a box that should have remained buried forever? In the ruins of an ancient Japanese temple, workers discovered a terrifying secret: a mummified creature with two faces and four arms. This isn't just a story; it is the dark reality of the Ryomen-sukuna curse. Legend says that anyone who looks upon the mummy will face a slow, agonizing decay of their body and mind. Have you ever felt like you were being watched from the shadows after hearing a ghost story? Tell us in the comments if you believe in ancient curses. Experience the true terror of Japanese Horror and the supernatural mystery of the Forbidden Box. Stay tuned for more creepy stories and urban legends from Japan. Japanese Horror, Urban Legend, Creepy, Ryomen Sukuna, Forbidden Box.
